home.headline: Leadership in Ambiguity.
home.subheadline: Driving value through judgment, empathy, and calculated risk.
home.intro: I am an early-career professional focused on solving complex problems constraints. This site documents my decisions, mistakes, and growth.

cases.title: Supply Chain Pivot
cases.context: Rapid disruption of primary vendor during Q4.
cases.decision: Shifted to local supplier with 15% higher cost but 100% reliability.
cases.outcome: Maintained delivery schedule; retained key client account.
